text: Zerhamra (also written Zaghamra) is a village in the commune of Béni Abbès, in Béchar Province, Algeria. It lies beneath the Ougarta Range of the Sahara desert. A local road connects the village to the N6 highway near the town of Béni Abbès to the northeast. ==References== Neighbouring towns and cities Category:Populated places in Béchar Province
title: Zerhamra
